description: The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the supply of specific parts which meet the requirements of the "Virtual Krakens".
full_summary:
# **Procurement of Virtual Krakens**

## **Request for Proposal**

### **Background Information**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply of specific parts that meet the requirements of the “Virtual Krakens.”

### **Trade Agreement**

This procurement is subject to the Canada Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### **Solicitation Information**

*   **Reference Number:** PW-23-01028075
*   **Amendment Number:** 1
*   **Solicitation Number:** W6369-230350
*   **Publication Date:** February 28, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** April 10, 2023, at 14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:** March 17, 2023

### **Notice Details**

*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence
*   **Address:**
    101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2
*   **End-User Entity:** Department of National Defence
*   **Contact Information:**
    Kelly McCormick (Kelly.McCormick@forces.gc.ca)

### **Solicitation Documents**

The solicitation documents, including the RFP and amendment, are available for download on [canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/).

*   **English Version:** [w6369-230350 - rfp english version.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/28/89305f0bfce0bd3f0533553d61ebdc0e/w6369-230350_-_rfp_english_version.pdf)
*   **French Version:** [w6369-230350 - rfp - amendement 001 fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/17/be1487a80bb705613b9771993abca665/w6369-230350_-_rfp_-_amendement_001_fr.pdf)

### **Evaluation Criteria**

The evaluation criteria will be based on the Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement and the nature of the requirements. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
